ingredients: 1 teaspoon stone-ground mustard, 2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar,   +   1/4 cup olive oil, 1  apple, diced, 1  pear, diced,   +   1/4 cup dried cranberries, 1 (10 ounce) package mixed baby greens,   +   1/4 cup crumbled blue cheese, 2 tablespoons chopped walnuts
nutrition: Total Fat 19g 24%, Saturated Fat 4g 19%, Cholesterol 6mg 2%, Sodium 161mg 7%, Total Carbohydrate 22g 8%, Dietary Fiber 4g 14%, Total Sugars 14g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 16mg 81%, Calcium 84mg 6%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 269mg 6%
